title: BRIEF-Sebata Board To Move Forward With Obtaining Approvals On Empowerment Transaction
text:
BRIEF-Sebata Board To Move Forward With Obtaining Approvals On Empowerment Transaction

Stock Markets 7 minutes ago (Oct 18, 2019 13:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Sebata Board To Move Forward With Obtaining Approvals On Empowerment Transaction Oct 18 (Reuters) - Sebata Holdings Ltd : * JSE: SEB - UPDATE ON THE EMPOWERMENT TRANSACTION * SEBATA HOLDINGS - AFTER RECEIPT OF APPROVALS, BOARD TO MOVE FORWARD WITH OBTAINING REGULATORY AND SHAREHOLDER APPROVALS ON EMPOWERMENT TRANSACTION

BRIEF-Sebata Board To Move Forward With Obtaining Approvals On Empowerment Transaction
